scripts.update-lang-id: find packages -type f -name "*.js" -o -name "*.jsx" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.html" | xargs grep -l "0002" | xargs sed -i '' 's/0002/0002/g'
scripts.build: npm run -w packages/app build && npm run -w packages/api build && npm run build-static
scripts.build-static: npm run -w packages/api build-lexicon; npm run -w packages/api build-spec
scripts.gcp:build: gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml --substitutions=COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'latest')
scripts.gcp:deploy: gcloud run deploy l0002 --source . --port 50002 --region us-central1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.gcp:logs: gcloud run logs read l0002 --region us-central1
